alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 2:01PM AKDT until March 20 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with reduced visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 45 mph. * WHERE...Northeastern Brooks Range. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst conditions will be through Brooks Range passes, including along the Dalton Highway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
